extendedInfo.description: âââ Featured by Engadget, Lifehacker, MKBHD and Leo Laporte on TWiT ââââââ "Action Launcher is something special." - Android Police ââââââ "Action Launcher brings something new to the table, and it's definitely worth a look." - Android Central âââ Action Launcher looks and feels like a natural launching pad for the Android ecosystem, and is designed to get you where you need to go, faster. Standout features include:* A sliding quickdrawer for instant access to all your apps and widgets.* 'Covers', an innovative new way to quickly launch apps and shortcuts without compromising the look of your carefully crafted homescreen.* 'Shutters', a unique feature that unlocks the power and potential of Android widgets. Swipe an app icon, and that app's widget is automatically created.* Quicksearch, a fast and powerful feature that allows you to search for apps, contacts and even music directly from the action bar. * Android's unique and powerful action bar is fully integrated into your desktop.* Full tablet support (including the Nexus 10).* Icon pack support.* Desktop layouts can be backed up and restored to and from an SD card.* All of the settings you expect from custom launcher: specify apps to hide, adjustable number of home screen pages, grid sizes, page margins, dock toggles, scaling icons, lock desktop, resize any widget, etc.* Strong Play Store integration.Action Launcher allows you to import from existing launcher layout from other launchers such as Apex, Nova, Sense, TouchWiz and the stock Android launcher, so you'll instantly feel right at home.Regarding permissions:* CALL_PHONE: Required so that any Direct Dial shortcuts you create can initiate a phone call.* READ_CONTACTS: Used to instantly filter your contacts via the integrated quicksearch.* READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE/WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: For backing exporting and restoring to and from an SD card.Action Launcher never transfers your personal data off your device.

reviews.title: Awesome Dev!
reviews.comment: Great launcher, Great Dev!
reviews.author: Mike Hoepfinger

reviews.title: The best launcher I have ever used
reviews.comment: Thanks for this great innovative launcher how others could learn from this concept true brilliance.
reviews.author: Jonathan Brown

reviews.title: Latest Update
reviews.comment: The NEW features make this launcher rise to the top and rival Nova.   He listens and the app is solid in performance, and the tweaks (most important) are increasing! Thanks for the efforts in that regard.
reviews.author: Callip Hall

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Wonderful launcher. Well worth the money.  I\'m glad to see a dev putting unique features into something like the launcher.
reviews.author: Johnathan Bass

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It is the best launcher that I know of, but it lacks in customizability. You cannot change the transitions which I would like to do. I recommend this launcher if you want a more efficient way to launch your apps, and are not focusing on customizability.
reviews.author: Caleb Williams

reviews.title: Fantastically simple!
reviews.comment: Really enjoying this launcher, Chris has brought back the app drawer for me.  The simple, intuitive, and all around handiness of the launcher make it my favorite.
reviews.author: John Lawson

reviews.title: Still a few issues, missing features
reviews.comment: The 1.9 release has made the launcher much smoother, but now I get the \"spinning circle\" every once in a while when I open the app launcher.  Also, the search function in the action bar is still borderline unusable.  It stalls and halts the phone as much as it ever did.  This is something basic that needs to be fixed if the developer is going to be asking 5 stars from his users.  This app has been vastly improved, but still has a way to go to get to Nova Launcher\'s reliability.  Also, it still needs unread counts.  This is something that Nova and other launchers have had for over a year.
reviews.author: Justin Barrett

reviews.title: Simply awesome
reviews.comment: Unique but intuitive, fast and fluid, stable... the best launcher I\'ve ever used.
reviews.author: Tad Brisson

reviews.title: Great start to what could be the premiere android launcher
reviews.comment: Really great launcher, stylish and functional. Once it can match customisation options of its rivals it definitely will be the pack leader. I hope multiple docks are added, as well as more transition animations. Other suggestions: option to add contact search to the left homescreen sidebar. Option to have dock and action bar as overlays so that more home screen room can be used for widgets. Thanks dev, it\'s great so far!!!
reviews.author: Arjun Pandey

reviews.title: Best launcher period.
reviews.comment: Intuitive gestures, smooth operations since update, and productivity personalization rather than just colors and themes. Best. Launcher. Period.
reviews.author: Joseph Hanes

reviews.title: Intuitive and now stable
reviews.comment: Perfect now with icon theme support. I can\'t go back to using other launchers. Cant wait for what dev has in store next
reviews.author: Juston Li

reviews.title: Great app with great support
reviews.comment: This launcher is simple yet incredibly functional with some very unique features. The updates have made a huge improvement in stability and performance; it is one of the smoothest launchers I\'ve used.
reviews.author: Fernando Prieto

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Recent update brought a new feature I had been waiting for. Looking forward for future updates!
reviews.author: James Bogert

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Awesome idea, very smooth and fluid gestures and scrolling. Using covers allowed me to eliminate all extra pages on my homescreen, just rocking 1 screen with a bunch of apps now. Love the simplicity.
reviews.author: Shane Earley

reviews.title: Best Launcher...
reviews.comment: ...hands down.  Meets all my launcher needs and new icon changer is the cherry on top. Keep up the awesome work Chris!!
reviews.author: Derek Sharer

reviews.title: Awesome Launcher
reviews.comment: This is the launcher that I have been looking for. Very smooth. The new update fixed everything! Awesome launcher!
reviews.author: Bradley Leyland

reviews.title: Great launcher!
reviews.comment: Great launcher with outstanding features.
reviews.author: Micah Ramsingh

reviews.title: Brilliant launcher
reviews.comment: I really like the use interface. But the reason it\'s not 5/5 for me is because it\'s still buggy and lags.   Make it smoother in future updates and I\'ll be more than happy to give this a perfect 5* star rating!
reviews.author: Christopher Green

reviews.title: Best launcher ever!
reviews.comment: This is truly the best launcher, the developer keeps adding new features! The support is awesome! If you\'re looking for a \"Non-Stock\" Android launcher, Action Launcher is the one for you!
reviews.author: Herco Smith

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: I love everything about it with one exception.  It needs a center-focused non scrolling wallpaper setting.  That one little missing thing drives me away every time I install it after only a few days max. Seems minor, but even a small itch will drive you mad over time.
reviews.author: Larry Plummer
